en.bio:
I have a background in Biomedical Sciences and Bioinformatics and the past years I have been involved in integrating and applying multi-OMIC research in various biological domains. I am an avid learner and my goal is to develop statistical models and machine learning methodologies that could provide bioinformatic solutions to clinical challenges.

Since 2021, I am part of the Integrative Genomics lab as a post-doctoral researcher where my main focus is the integration of multi-OMIC data for the development of statistical and machine-learning predictive models that could be applied on complex diseases and precision medicine.
